document.full_text: charl schwartzel and louis oosthuizen failed to cope with a fiendishly difficult west course and unseasonably cool weather when both major winners missed the cut at the pga championship on friday.
document.title: major winners schwartzel and oosthuizen miss wentworth cut
lines_and_colors: charl schwartzel and louis oosthuizen failed to cope with a fiendishly difficult west course and unseasonably cool weather when both major winners missed the cut at the pga championship on friday.
